LanguageData.SculptureSmall.label: small sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureSmall.description: A torso-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form。
LanguageData.SculptureSmall_Blueprint_Install.label: small sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.SculptureLarge.label: large sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureLarge.description: A person-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form。
LanguageData.SculptureLarge_Blueprint_Install.label: large sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.SculptureGrand.label: grand sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureGrand.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form。
LanguageData.SculptureGrand_Blueprint_Install.label: grand sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.MuffaloArt.label: 野牛雕塑
LanguageData.MuffaloArt.description: The holy Muffalo is a creature worshiped by the Cheda of the Indigo Gerbil Tribe on Alioth Posterius。
LanguageData.MuffaloArt_Blueprint_Install.label: muffalo sculpture (蓝图)
LanguageData.QueenArt.label: 皇后雕塑
LanguageData.QueenArt.description: This stunning statue is a likeness of "Anha the Graceful" a matriarch of the Gray People Tribe known to be a dazzling and exquisite beauty。
LanguageData.QueenArt_Blueprint_Install.label: queen sculpture (蓝图)
LanguageData.WolfArt.label: 野狼雕塑
LanguageData.WolfArt.description: This statue depicts the wolf-like god named "LORDI", worshiped by the Purple Lobster Crouca on Aldhafera XI
LanguageData.WolfArt_Blueprint_Install.label: wolf sculpture (蓝图)
LanguageData.DragonArt.label: 魔幻雕塑
LanguageData.DragonArt.description: This stunning huge statue of magical beast with a crocodilian head。
LanguageData.DragonArt_Blueprint_Install.label: behir sculpture (蓝图)
LanguageData.ZeonArt.label: ZONE雕塑
LanguageData.ZeonArt.description: A sculpture of Zeon. You only hope in building this he decides to not come to visit。
LanguageData.ZeonArt_Blueprint_Install.label: zeon sculpture (蓝图)
LanguageData.DecorativeUrnSmall.label: 装饰瓮
LanguageData.DecorativeUrnSmall.description: A small piece of decorative pottery。
LanguageData.SmallPottery.label: 装饰陶器
LanguageData.SmallPottery.description: A small pieces of pottery decorated with various pictures and carvings. They have no practical use。
LanguageData.SmallPottery_Blueprint_Install.label: decorative pottery (蓝图)
LanguageData.PotteryDisplay.label: 陶艺展示架
LanguageData.PotteryDisplay.description: A display stand showing various pieces of decorative pottery. Many of these have painted or carved pictures on them。
LanguageData.PotteryDisplay_Blueprint_Install.label: pottery display stand (蓝图)
LanguageData.Snowman.label: snowman
LanguageData.Snowman.description: A set of large snowballs piled and shaped to resemble a person。
